Module com.iseehealth
Package com.iseehealth

Class Controllers

java.lang.Object
com.iseehealth.Controllers
Direct Known Subclasses:
DietCheckController, FitnessCheckController, MentalCheckController, MonthlyReportsController, MorningBasicSkinCheckController, MorningDigestCheckController, MorningPainCheckController, WeeklyReportsController
public class Controllers extends Object
This class is to create a controller for all the scenes.
